# MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter.sample0

**Case**

No filter is applied.

## Declaration

```swift
case sample0
```

## Depth resolve filters

- **MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter.min**: The GPU compares all depth samples in the pixel and selects the sample with the smallest value.
- **MTLMultisampleDepthResolveFilter.max**: The GPU compares all depth samples in the pixel and selects the sample with the largest value.
